衎字的基本解释

衎
kàn
快乐。
安定。
和适自得的样子。

衎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kàn］
［《廣韻》苦旰切，去翰，溪。］
［《廣韻》空旱切，上旱，溪。］
(1)乐；欢乐。
(2)自得。参见“衎爾”。
(3)安定。
(4)出。
(5)刚直。参见“衎衎”、“衎然”。
(6)姓。卫公子衎之后。见《姓觿》。

衎字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【行字部】　衎； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页1109第01
【唐韻】苦旰切【集韻】【韻會】墟旰切，?音看。【說文】行喜兒。【爾雅·釋詁】衎，樂也。【詩·小雅】君子有酒，嘉賔式燕以衎。【曹植·娛賔賦】遂衎賔而高會兮，丹幃曄以四張。　又【揚子·方言】衎，定也。【郭註】衎然安定貌。　又【廣韻】苦旱切，音侃。信言也。

考證：〔【說文】行喜也。〕　謹照原文也改兒。
衎字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
衎字的起名意思

：指快乐、安定、刚直、和适自得的样子。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kàn］
["Guangyun" bitterly cut, go to Han, Xi. ]
["Guangyun" cut dry in the air, dry up, and creek. ]
(1) Music; joy.
(2) Contentment. See "Yun Er".
(3) Stability.
(4) Out.
(5) Upright. See "衎衎", "衎ran".
(6) Last name. After the son of Wei. See "surname".

[Shen Jixia] [Xing Zi Department] 　衎; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 1109 No. 01
[Tang Yun] Suffering cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ruins cut, look at the sound. [Said Wen] Xing Xier. 【Erya·Shigu】Yun, Le Ye. [Poetry·Xiaoya] The gentleman has wine, and the Jiayi-style swallows are used for 衎. 【Cao Zhi·Entertainment Bladder Fu】Then he has a bladder and a high meeting, with four pieces of Danshiye.　[Yangtze Dialect] 衎, Ding Ye. [Guo's Note] Yan Ran has a stable appearance.　[Guangyun] Hard and dry, sound kan. Faith also. Textual research: [[Said Wen] Xing Xi Ye. 〕　I would like to change the original text.

Name meaning
: Refers to the appearance of happiness, stability, integrity, and contentment.
